Mr. Nguyen Thanh in Dam Soi district has been

Hac. Chaotic and anxious lives cause many

England, the healers are
retired dairy cows at

yure is providing a rarely seen healing service,

equivalent to 1.2 million VND.  In Vietnam,

caress the bugs here for
three hours. I suffer from depression and
anxiety disorders and being here cuddling
these cows makes me forget all my worries.
This is a very lovely experience
for the farm owner. The
comfort of the cows is as important as the
mental health of the customers so the
cows have been trained for five months in advance to
get used to being cuddled.  I think
the cows also really like to be hugged and paid
attention. If they don't like it,
they won't lie down so well. The
farm owner came up with this activity
after they were forced to sell nearly half of their dairy cows
last year.  Doing healing sessions
with cows not only helps the farm
